TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Gali-hwan, title = Gali-hwan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gali-hwan} }

S.FORM: Gali-hwan Itiniay i Tai'an Cen no Miaoli ko Gali-hwan a niyaro', 61 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 188 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 86% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 162 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 14% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 26 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 82%, Amis 1%, Saysiyat 2%, Bunun 3%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

Gali-hwan Itiniay i Tai'an Cen no Miaoli ko Gali-hwan a niyaro', 61 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 188 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 86% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 162 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 14% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 26 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 82%, Amis 1%, Saysiyat 2%, Bonon 3%. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
